names.english: decoction for nourishing the blood and dispelling wind
names.commonEnglish: Decoction for Nourishing the Blood and Dispelling Wind

actions: Clears Heat, cools the Blood and nourishes Yin.
Tonifies the Middle Jiao, augments Qi, nourishes the Blood and promotes the generation of Body Fluids.
Clears Heat, cools and harmonizes the Blood, i Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Liver Fire, drains pus and reduces swelling.
With Sheng Di Huang, for Kidney Yin Deficiency with steaming bones.
Clears Heat, resolves Fire-toxicity, expels Wind, clears Damp-Heat and stops itching.
Dispels Wind-Dampness, Clears and transforms Damp-Heat and eliminates toxins.
With Wei Ling Xian, for Wind-Dampness.
Tonifies the Blood invigorates and harmonizes the Blood Reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and alleviates pain
Dispels Wind-Dampness, unblocks the channels and alleviates pain.
Extinguishes Wind, drains Liver Heat, pacifies Liver Yang and releases the Exterior.
Unblocks the channels, dispels Wind-Dampness and Alleviates itching.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood and Jing and expels Wind from the skin by nourishing the Blood.
With Sheng Di Huang, for Damp-Heat or Wind-Heat causing eczema and itch.

symptoms: Tic or tremor of hands and feet
